price: But Allah knows best your enemies. Allah is sufficient as a Protector, and Allah is sufficient as a Helper.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِأَعۡدَآئِكُمۡۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ نَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
